Events.Event_Name: Will ever become female sex worker (FSW) in Northern

Events.COMMENT: Before starting RTEC, give the exiting Accessibility:Yes people the intervention so only No people don't have it.
Have a NLHTIV setup to get newborns that are set to Yes - this is the 80% defined in demograhics
Assume people without the intervention are Accessibility:No - people not set to Yes when born - the other 20%.
